targets.query:
from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /memused|memshared|memfree/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "nvme")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "available_spare")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "sata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "raw_read_error_rate" or r["_field"] == "write_error_rate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "nvme")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "critical_warning" or r["_field"] == "unsafe_shutdowns" or r["_field"] == "media_errors" or r["_field"] == "num_err_log_entries")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "sata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reallocate_nand_blk_cnt" or r["_field"] == "erase_fail_count" 
                    or r["_field"] == "program_fail_count" or r["_field"] == "error_correction_count" 
                    or r["_field"] == "reallocated_event_count" or r["_field"] == "udma_crc_error_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "nvme")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "data_units_read" or r["_field"] == "data_units_written")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "sata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_lbas_written")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 512}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "sata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /raw_read_error_rate|write_error_rate|reallocate_nand_blk_cnt/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "pve" and
    r._measurement == "temp" and
    r._field !~ /core/
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "pve" and
    r.devtype == "sata" and
    r._measurement == "disks" and
    r._field == "temperature_celsius"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "nvme")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "data_units_read_from_day1" or r["_field"] == "data_units_written_from_day1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "nvme")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /available_spare$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "nvme")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /critical_warning|media_errors/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avail")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "local-lvm" or r["host"] == "synology-backup-ct-vm" or r["host"] == "local" or r["host"] == "proxmox-backup-server-sata-2TB")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "pve-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["devtype"] == "nvme")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "num_err_log_entries")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
